text: Edward Francis Crawford (born April 25, 1938) is an American businessman. He was the U.S. Ambassador to Ireland from 2019 to 2021 during the Donald Trump administration. He was chairman and CEO of Park-Ohio Holdings. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Ireland Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Edward F. Crawford
